price: Sababaa waan isaan jedhaniitiin Rabbiin jannatoota laggeen ishee jala yaatu,isaan mindeesse, ishee keessatti hafoodha, Kuni mindaa warra tolchitootaati.
arabic: فَأَثَٰبَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ بِمَا قَالُواْ جَنَّٰتٖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهَا ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ وَذَٰلِكَ جَزَآءُ ٱلۡمُحۡسِنِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fa-athābahumu al-lahu bimā qālū jannātin tajrī min taḥtihā al-anhāru khālidīna fīhā wadhālika jazāu al-muḥ'sinīna
